name: 2024 6th International Conference on Computer, Software Engineering and Applications
content: Publication: All accepted full papers will be published in the CSEA 2024 Conference Proceedings. The proceedings will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, and other prominent databases. It is mandatory for at least one author of each accepted paper to actively participate in this year's conference and deliver a presentation.
organizers: University of Shanghai for Science and Technology, China
